com.orientechnologies.orient.core.sql

Class OSQLScriptEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.sql.OSQLScriptEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScriptEngine

    public class OSQLScriptEngine
extends Object
implements ScriptEngine
    Dynamic script engine for OrientDB SQL commands. This implementation is multi-threads.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli (l.garulli--at--orientechnologies.com)
